Parameters.Parameter: Data providers, UW-Macrostrat, John J Czaplewski <john@czaplewski.org>

Datasource.Parameter: (SELECT m.map_id, m.source_id, COALESCE(m.name, '') AS name, COALESCE(m.strat_name, '') AS strat_name, COALESCE(m.age, '') AS age, COALESCE(m.lith, '') AS lith, COALESCE(m.descrip, '') AS descrip, COALESCE(m.comments, '') AS comments, COALESCE(m.t_interval, 0) AS t_int, COALESCE(ta.interval_name, '') AS t_int_name, l.best_age_top::numeric AS best_t_age, COALESCE(m.b_interval, 0) AS b_int, COALESCE(tb.interval_name, '') AS b_int_name, l.best_age_bottom::numeric AS best_b_age, COALESCE(l.color, '#777777') AS color, m.geom FROM maps.medium m LEFT JOIN lookup_medium l on m.map_id = l.map_id LEFT JOIN macrostrat.intervals ta ON ta.id = m.t_interval LEFT JOIN macrostrat.intervals tb ON tb.id = m.b_interval ) subset
(SELECT line_id, source_id, COALESCE(name, '') AS name, COALESCE(descrip, '') AS descrip, COALESCE(new_type, '') AS type, COALESCE(new_direction, '') AS direction, geom FROM lines.medium) subset2
